effect.red_blue: Pokémon on the user’s side of the field are immune to stat-lowering effects for five turns. guard swap, heart swap, and power swap may still be used. defog used by an opponent will end this effect.
effect.yellow: Pokémon on the user’s side of the field are immune to stat-lowering effects for five turns. guard swap, heart swap, and power swap may still be used. defog used by an opponent will end this effect.
effect.red_green_japan: Pokémon on the user’s side of the field are immune to stat-lowering effects for five turns. guard swap, heart swap, and power swap may still be used. defog used by an opponent will end this effect.
effect.blue_japan: Pokémon on the user’s side of the field are immune to stat-lowering effects for five turns. guard swap, heart swap, and power swap may still be used. defog used by an opponent will end this effect.

short_effect.red_blue: Protects the user’s stats from being changed by enemy moves.
short_effect.yellow: Protects the user’s stats from being changed by enemy moves.
short_effect.red_green_japan: Protects the user’s stats from being changed by enemy moves.
short_effect.blue_japan: Protects the user’s stats from being changed by enemy moves.
